name: Sanctuary Pilgrim: Dune Dreams (I)

stage1.title: Sanctuary Pilgrim: Dune Dreams (I)
stage1.description: Unlock all the Shrines of Depths in the following areas in Sumeru: Hypostyle Desert, Land of Upper Setekh, and Land of Lower Setekh.
